Reviews.Title: This seller is garbage!
Reviews.Author: MD QT
Reviews.Content: Do not buy from this seller! They charge a 20% restocking fee without stating this upfront. They ship the products without giving you any indication on how it was shipped until you contact them four or five times. Then whatever you bought from them gets shipped back to their warehouse and you get charged money for an item that you never received.
